review: As an early adopter, I expected a few bugs, and got them. The device occasionally plays sound from an unknown place (not from the currently watched show). It also has a bug where a Amazon playlist of ~25 songs shows you're listening to "Song 0/0", so you have to constantly manually play the next song. It will also occasionally freeze completely (tho this is pretty rare). All of these glitches are resolved with a device reboot. I suspect future software updates will continue to refine the Fire Stick.

review: We have Apple TV, Roku, and now the fire stick. We were initially excited about this low cost solution for streaming on our third t.v. Unfortunately, it's been almost unusable. While it was very easy to set up, it was also very unpredictable in use. We thought at first it was the distance from the router that was the problem, but our apple t.v. Worked perfectly in the same location.
